post.author: flarn2006
post.body:
Yes, I know this topic has been brought up before, but does anybody know of a plugin for Maya 7.0 Unlimited that will let me export models to ASE? I would like a web link please.
BTW, no shareware/commercial/demo. Completely free software only please!

post.author: der_ton
post.body: If you want to get models into Doom3, I believe D3 reads Maya ASCII files (*.ma). At least there's alot of them in D3:ROE.
